title: Cloning Rust Structs with Clone Trait
description: In this lab, we learn about using the Clone trait in Rust to make copies of resources, such as structs, by using the .clone() method. The Clone trait allows us to create independent copies of resources, and we can use the .clone() method to create a new instance with the same values.

meta.title: Rust Programming | Clone Trait | Resource Copying
meta.description: Learn how to use the Clone trait in Rust to make copies of resources like structs. Understand the importance of cloning and how to create independent copies of your data.
meta.keywords: Rust, Programming, Clone Trait, Resource Copying, Data Cloning

i18n.title: 使用Clone特性克隆Rust结构体
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们学习如何在Rust中使用Clone特性，通过.clone()方法来复制结构体等资源。Clone特性使我们能够创建资源的独立副本，并且可以使用.clone()方法创建一个具有相同值的新实例。

meta.title: Rust编程 | Clone特性 | 资源复制
meta.description: 学习如何在Rust中使用Clone特性来复制结构体等资源。了解克隆的重要性以及如何创建数据的独立副本。
meta.keywords: Rust,编程,Clone特性,资源复制,数据克隆
